name: Poison
explanation: When poisoned, a player's avatar begins following the mouse as if it were rotated from center a certain number of degrees (rolled randomly once poison is applied).
description: A powerful poison has overcome you, altering your perception of the world.

name: Bleed
explanation: When bleeding, a player takes more damage, and is more likely to receive critical hits and other ailments.
description: Deep, rending wounds have left you vulnerable to further damage.

name: Freeze
explanation: When frozen, movement and attack/cast speed is reduced.
description: A bone-deep chill has racked you, making it difficult to move quickly.

name: Stun
explanation: When stunned, the player's avatar slows to a stop (like a bird that has stopped flapping its wings).
description: Your perception is overwhelmed, leaving you immobile.

name: Burn
explanation: When burned, the player takes damage when receiving movement speed increases and turning, with the damage increasing for sharp turns.
description: Flames have scoured you, leaving their mark as a lingering pain that intensifies when you exert yourself.

name: BloodDrunk
explanation: When blooddrunk, a player's avatar no longer follows the mouse with a straight vector. Its path begins resembling a sine wave, with the amplitude increasing with every kill.
description: You find it harder to control yourself the more you feast upon your victims.

name: Sacrifice
explanation:
Player has a chance of receiving this debuff upon taking the lead/winning a match.  

Evo: Not only do they glow as normal , every player is always notified of their position. If the player wins with this debuff having been applied for at least two minutes, they receive a 20% win bonus and carry Sacrifice into the next round.

Infinite: They are assailed by demon NPCs during the match.
description: You are branded a sacrifice. Those who defeat you will be rewarded.

name: Silence
description: You are unable to use spell skills.

name: Blind
description: Your vision has gone dark, leaving you unable to see more than a few feet in front of you.

name: Sick
explanation: Eating sprites reduces energy rapidly.
description: Your body is racked with illness, and eating seems to make it worse.

name: Slow
explanation: When slowed, movement and attack speed is reduced to a lesser extent than freezing, but projectiles and skill cooldowns are also affected.
description: The world around you seems to be moving much faster. Or are you moving slower?

name: EvolveLock
explanation: If the player is a dragonling or whelp, they will not evolve even if their bar is filled.
description: No matter how much you consume, you can't seem to evolve past your current state.

name: Complacent
explanation: Jester's folly aura. Reduces damage, damage resistance.
description: Is this person serious? That's literally a flat piece of wood...

name: Rooted
explanation: Movement skills are disabled
description: You are unable to use your movement skills.

name: Airborne
description: An attack has caused you to lose your footing.

name: Sleep
explanation: The character fells on a slumber, vision darkens, disables movement.  Sleeping units are awakened upon taking damage.
description: You fell into a deep slumber

name: Shatter
explanation: Receives increased damage after petrification/freeze/block is broken
description: You take increased damage from all damage types

name: Polymorph
explanation: Units under polymorph are transformed into a critter (frog,fish,insect etc) movement is slowed  to 10% of base. Unable to cast spells use items etc.
description: You are transformed into a critter.

name: Armor Weakened
description: Your defenses have been pierced.

name: Healing Prevention
description: Player can not use healing and receives no benefit from regenerative effects.

name: Ethereal
explanation: Ethereal units are disarmed, takes additional magical damage.
description: Unit is transferred to another plain, leaving their spirit remnant.

name: Haste
explanation: When hasted, the speed of actions increases and spell cooldowns are reduced.
description: The world around you seems to be moving much more slowly. Or are you moving faster?

name: GuildLeadership
explanation: Small buffs to movement, attack, and defense.
description: A high-ranking member of your guild is nearby, and you are motivated to impress.

name: BurstOfSpeed
description: A short-lived burst of movement speed.

name: Disarm
explanation: unable to attack using physical attacks / causes the character to attack using their own fist = little to damage
description: unable to use physical attacks

name: Petrify
explanation: Renders the character immobile, unable to use spells or attack and is vulnerable to physical attacks
description: Turns the character into stone. Can be shattered for increase damaged

name: Fear
explanation: forced movement away from the caster. Unable to attack or cast spells
description: Causes you to run away due to terror

name: Confuse
explanation: Inverted controls. moving up makes your character move down. turning left will make your character turn right
description: Disrupts the ability of the player to control their unit

name: Parry
explanation:
Players should be able to strike down incoming projectiles with Physical attack if timed correctly. 

ex: fireballs, arrows, bolts etc. 
doesnt affect beam type or aoe effect spells
description: When timed right, allows the character to strike incoming projectiles destroying it in the process

name: Block
explanation: Player takes reduce damage from incoming attacks. Block is broken when a certain damage point is reached which then results to vulnerable/ shatter state.
description: blocks incoming spells/ projectiles and physical attacks.  Takes reduce damage until block threshold is broken

name: Reflect
explanation: reflects projectiles back to the caster.
description: reflects incoming projectiles

name: Oil
description: Unit receives amplified damage from fire based spells and increases slow of ice based spells

name: Wet
description:
Unit receives amplified damage from lightning spells and is render vulnerable to freeze 
reduced damaged from fire based spells

name: HP Critical
explanation: Based % to trigger is 25%
description: Activates when a unit reached a certain percent of their HP. Can induce positive /negative buffs

name: Magnetism
explanation: Draws enemies in to the source

name: MovementDamage
explanation: Damages enemies that move across the affected area
